author: dkhaywood
msg: Added a new @Defaulted annotation with corresponding DefaultsProvider, plugs into @Value in an analogous manner to @Encodeable and @Parser.
Right now this default if non-null isn't being picked up, but that's cos the getFacet() stuff on OneToOneAssociation etc doesn't search through to the underlying type's facets.

author: dkhaywood
msg: Added in a facet factory for @Aggregated (since we now have the @Value annotation installing an AggregatedFacet also).  Also fixed an error introduced in the date/time tests.

author: dkhaywood
msg: Added in a facet factory for @Aggregated (since we now have the @Value annotation installing an AggregatedFacet also).  Also fixed an error introduced in the date/time tests.
